lead_paragraph: HOWARD--Bernard. It is with deep regret and sorrow that the Officers, Board of Governors, members and staff of Fresh Meadow Country Club mourn the loss of our esteemed member, Mr. Bernard Howard. The Howards have been members of Fresh Meadow for 37 years. Bernard and Irma were married for 73 years. We extend our heartfelt sympathy to Irma, their children, Lorrie Gerson, Ellen Berge, Kathy Jacobson and Ned Howard and their grandchildren. Lee D. Charles, President Howard Hershenhorn, Secretary 1/3
